name: Grocery Grab (itch)
description:
Early Kinskii mini game prototype. Video chat and other platform features of Kinskii not shown.

How To Play:

Player 1 - Click the little robots with your mouse. One click stuns, two click destroys. Make the robots drop the food so player 2 can catch them

Player 2 - Control the cart with the left and right arrow keys on your keyboard. Get underneath the food to catch it!

Point system, art, and much more still to come!
